name: De Spelunca Ex Elementis
description:
A young mage has been corrupted by the power of the elements. You, as his previous master, are the only hope to save him.

De Spelunca Ex Elementis is a little metroidvania, develop in Game Maker Studio 1.4 but with some limitation of the Pico-8 (same palette, font and room dimension). It also has an online highscore.

And.. Yes, it is inspired by GET OUT of this Dungeon.

You can play it on Windows or on Android.

The whole code is open-source: you can fint it on GitHub.
